17#include <sys/types.h>
18
19#include <glob.h>
20#include <unistd.h>
21
22#include "compat.h"
23
24void fatal(const char *, ...);
25void fatalx(const char *, ...);
26
27#ifdef HAVE_PROC_PID
28int
29getdtablecount(void)
30{
31 char path[PATH_MAX];
32 glob_t g;
33 int n = 0;
34
35 if (snprintf(path, sizeof path, "/proc/%ld/fd/*", (long)getpid()) < 0)
36 fatal("snprintf overflow");
37 if (glob(path, 0, NULL, &g) == 0)
38 n = g.gl_pathc;
39 globfree(&g);
40 return (n);
41}
42#else
43int
44getdtablecount(void)
45{
46 return (0);
47}
48#endif
49
